applic.displayText: Mountain bicycle and (Mountain storm Mk1 or Brook trekker Mk9)

levelledPara.title: The bicycle wheel
levelledPara.para:
The wheel (refer to fig-0001) of a bicycle is a complex structure. The wheel assembly has these parts:
the tire
the tube
the spokes
the spoke nipples
the valve
the hub
On their own, the individual components are not very strong. But, when they are installed together, the components make the complete wheel (refer to fig-0001). The complete wheel is resistant to almost any type of heavy loads and operation.

levelledPara.title: Spoke Nipples
levelledPara.para: The spoke nipples are an essential part of the wheel assembly.

levelledPara.title: The Spokes
levelledPara.para: The spokes are the rods that connect the hub to the rim.

levelledPara.title: The Rim
levelledPara.para: The rim is the outer part of the wheel.
